EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - SEA
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Seattle.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Seattle Tuesday, June 21st, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/seattle?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Seattle]]>
Location Galvanize <[[http://www.galvanize.com/campuses/seattle-pioneer-square/]]> 111 S Jackson Street Seattle, WA 98104 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/111+S+Jackson+St,+Seattle,+WA+98104/@47.5989653,-122.3359822,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54906aa4e81f689f:0x6f218418c4ae7643!8m2!3d47.5989617!4d-122.3337989]]>
Parking Pioneer Square Garage 74 S. Jackson Street Seattle, WA 98104 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/74+S+Jackson+St,+Seattle,+WA+98104/@47.5995112,-122.3373566,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54906aa51c309e6b:0xc653bbb87f3b2f96!8m2!3d47.5995076!4d-122.3351679]]>
Questions? Contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
